short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, organize, and restore groups of tabs with advanced features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabKeeper is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by allowing you to manage and restore tab groups effortlessly. With TabKeeper, you can save your open tabs into named groups and restore them later with just one click, helping you organize your work or personal browsing. Perfect for users who work across multiple projects or need to save sessions for later use. 

Features include:

Quick tab group saving
Restoring saved tab groups
Simple UI for managing saved groups
Search through saved tab groups easily
Efficient keyboard shortcuts to streamline usage

Install TabKeeper now and never lose track of your tabs again!
